title: Streams
description: The World Economic Forum is an independent international organization committed to improving the state of the world by engaging business, political, academic and other leaders of society to shape global, regional and industry agendas. Incorporated as a not-for-profit foundation in 1971, and headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland, the Forum is tied to no political, partisan or national interests.
cleaned_text: Tech Mahindra: COVID-19 vaccination drive The [Tech Mahindra](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.techmahindra.com_en-2Din_covid-2D19-2Dresponse_&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=_MCwNO8b-fzsXwiCRGeI1LQ4Zjnvd7qd-wgC35Z4kcQ&e=) team along with its CSR arm Tech Mahindra foundation have [stepped forward to support communities](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.techmahindra.com_en-2Din_covid-2D19-2Dresponse_&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=_MCwNO8b-fzsXwiCRGeI1LQ4Zjnvd7qd-wgC35Z4kcQ&e=) across India. To combat the consequences of the pandemic, [Tech Mahindra Foundation team](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__techmahindrafoundation.org_&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=bxIOIf450S-2oypsAY7rSpEwOcUxcdNTiHSAR1eDP9A&e=) is relentlessly working to direct the support towards the most vulnerable population including Healthcare workers, Security Personnel, Sanitation Workers, Migrant Workers, and more/ The team has forged partnerships with [#OxygenForIndia](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.mahindra.com_news-2Droom_press-2Drelease_tech-2Dmahindra-2Dfoundation-2Dsupports-2Doxygenforindia-2Dto-2Ddeploy-2D3000-2Doxygen-2Dconcentrators-2Dand-2D40000-2Doxygen-2Dcylinders&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=CFJjl8PhCBtTJiJ188Y7PP8xW4_zMOGeiR9O9TRP8xo&e=) to deploy 3,000 oxygen concentrators and 40,000 oxygen cylinders to help resolve the oxygen crisis in India. [Tech Mahindra Foundation and Mission Oxygen](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.techmahindra.com_en-2Din_techm-2Dfoundation-2Dand-2Dmission-2Doxygen-2Dto-2Dset-2D50-2Doxygen-2Dplants_&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=yVDjC8muLLMR3D2MUsV2_U6qULYFD_IwEY3h-Lj1NJ8&e=) are also working together to set up 50 Oxygen Plants for Charitable and Government Hospitals across India. Tech Mahindra has also set up information and infrastructure initiatives such as [COVID care centers](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__economictimes.indiatimes.com_tech_information-2Dtech_tech-2Dmahindra-2Dopens-2Dcovid-2D19-2Dcare-2Dunit-2Din-2Dhinjewadi-2Dpune-2Dfacility_articleshow_82605128.cms&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=UOT0dCyfdSMENhODoe1IafEDHEA6Pw9anZ3WuklikNA&e=) at campuses across cities, appointing a [wellness officer](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.business-2Dstandard.com_article_companies_tech-2Dmahindra-2Dappoints-2Dwellness-2Dofficer-2Dto-2Dhelp-2Dworkforce-2Damid-2Dcovid-2D121051500472-5F1.html&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=sqOFA13vUrH0dPfBJq1-TZPtNvqJo2Yfqo4CvKBLLD8&e=), vaccination drives for employees, tele-calling support to NGOs and created COVID SOS applications to ensure timely availability of verified information for those in need. Maker's Lab, the innovation team at Tech M, is working on multiple innovations such as; [drug molecule research to potentially attack coronavirus with Reagene Biosciences](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3A__www.businessworld.in_article_Tech-2DMahindra-2DReagene-2DTo-2DFile-2DPatent-2DFor-2DMolecule-2DThat-2DPotentially-2DAttacks-2DCoronavirus_03-2D05-2D2021-2D388405_&d=DwMGaQ&c=VWART3hH1Kkv_uOe9JqhCg&r=W5TN4gDgaYmxPXoHN_gID_IZgcqK8WWw1JBZKIz3AJk&m=1pqcGXHQUjSP5oRu-Z-qCMPu258oNOWZ0C3fQHp-lOY&s=ebtZ2ppzZAsQCcNNUZV3UmDOhkKAq1ZTTp-qe2yFC5s&e=), Protein Folding Research, Predictive Tool - SEIR Modelling, Covid-19 Chat-bot, WhatsApp SOS Seva and a product prototype for frugal oxygen generation (product development underway).
